Concluding tips for self health care – the 
traditional way
In the traditional health care approach, health is achieved by devoting time for 
mind and body. Thus, two to three hours every day should be set aside for self 
health care; enonly th can holistic health be achieved. Otherwise one remains 
dependent on medicines.
133
A schedule of two to three hours per day should be something like this:
✱	Daily walk: 45 minutes.
✱	Daily workout: One hour - Yoga/exercise/aerobics/gym.
✱	Daily meditation: 20 minutes.
✱	Daily prayer according to belief: 15 minutes in the morning and evening.
